attributes.action: Give more powers to child support agency to investigate the non resident parent income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe the child support agency needs more power to investigate the income of a non resident parent when the lifestyle does not match the said income.

Eg: After having a case with CSA for the last one year, a earnings deduction order was sent to his employer ( his brother in his case).
The same month he declared, his income decreased to £100 or less.

I believe that this was done to avoid paying the arreas and stop them chasing further payments. Also his lifestyle does not match the income
eg:Gym memberships totaling £250
 cinema membership
fairly new car and a 3 bedroom house.

When I asked csa to investigate his lifestyle, I was informed that I had to proove his income did not match.How am I supposedto do so, when i have a restaining order agaist him!!!!

My question is,
Should it not be CSA conducting this investigation ??
